name: Statue of Pizza - AfterGlow
description:
AfterGlow was a submission to a 2 week long Game Jam hosted by the University of Portsmouth!

AfterGlow is a Star Fox inspired Rhythm Action game with a focus on manoeuvring and rotating to fit through tight spaces.

Roles:

Elliot Gorny: Project Manager, Designer, Programmer

Prisha Gellaboina: Lead Programmer

Erin Bateman: Artist

Shamma Albuainain: Artist

Jack Murray:Programmer

Lauren Perry:Programmer

All assets in the game were made by us unless otherwise specified.

Prisha Gellaboina - Core gameplay (movement, camera, shooting, player functions), Menus, UI, Bugfixing and Playtesting and fill in programming tasks: 

Erin Bateman - Ship Design, 3D modelling, UV mapping, Composing, SFX sourced

Jack Murray - Collision, Spinning platform

Shamma Albuainain - Ship Design, Enemy Design, Concept art, Texturing, VFX, UI, Logo/Menus, Cover art

Lauren Perry - Chasing Enemy AI

Elliot Gorny - Collision, Chasing/Shooting Enemy AI, Damage, UV Mapping, Logo design, Concept, Level design, Project Management

All sound effects were sourced from:

MusicLegends - laser shoot sound

Alexnekita - collision sound

Jacksonacademyashmore - player death sound

Humanoide9000 - portal sound

Shinephoenixstormcrow - sound when passing through rings

211redman112 - enemy fire sound
